extract_letters.name: extract_letters
extract_letters.description: Count the occurrences of each letter in the Letter Bank: {OAMFETIMPECRFSHTDNIWANEPNOFAAIYOOMGUTNAHHLNEHCME}.

spell_first_sentence.name: spell_first_sentence
spell_first_sentence.description: Use the letters to spell out 'I am a penguin halfway to the moon', tracking used and remaining letters.

attempt_spell_second_sentence.name: attempt_spell_second_sentence
attempt_spell_second_sentence.description: Attempt to spell 'The moon is made of cheese' with the remaining letters from 'spell_first_sentence' and identify missing or extra letters.

generate_change_list.name: generate_change_list
generate_change_list.description: Identify the letters that need to be changed to spell the second sentence and return them as a comma-separated, alphabetized list.
